text: (Kumbuchilani) katema kajwaŵechete Allah kuti: “E mmwe Isa! Chisimutu Une chinan'jigale ni kunkwesya Kukwangu, soni chinanswejesye ku ŵandu makafili, ni chinaatende ŵandu ŵankuyiye kuŵa pachanya pa ŵandu makafili mpaka lisiku lya Kiyama. Kaneko Kukwangu nikwakuujila kwenu ni tinjijiilanya chilikati chenu mu ichindu yamwaliji nkulekangana.”
